function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Shortage of vital medical equipment such as ventilators and n95 masks","category":"Inadequate hospital design ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on imports and donations for critical healthcare equipment","category":"Diversification and circularity of supply
